*div1 type="summary"* *p*Eliza M. Austin to Emily Perry, January 6, 1830. Austin's labors. Progress of the colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-06-1830">Jan. 6th, 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*My dear *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*:*/p*
*p*In answer to your very kind letter, I scarcely know what to say. You must long before this heard of the death of your dear *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*. You my dear *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*can well imagine what my feelings are; looseing all that was Dear to me in this *location_mentioned*world*/location_mentioned*, my *person_mentioned*Husband*/person_mentioned*, my *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned*, my *person_mentioned*protector*/person_mentioned*, my all. But my *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*there is no remedy for the decrees of providence, but submission. *person_mentioned*Brother Stephen*/person_mentioned* was at the same time very sick and not expected to live. We all thought that every moment was his last but God was merciful to us, and spared him to take care of his dear *person_mentioned*little Stephen*/person_mentioned*. Our *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*is very anxious for *person_mentioned*Mr. Perry*/person_mentioned* to move to this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, but I dare not flatter myself with an idea of seeing you so soon, if *person_mentioned*Stephen */person_mentioned*was sure that you would move in the *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1830">spring*/date_mentioned*, he would fatten up and be a different man, he is now nothing but a mere shadow, and if he does not quit his desk, ride about and take more exercise, his life will be but short. Next week he is a going out with the *person_mentioned*Surveyors */person_mentioned*and will spend a month or more in the *location_mentioned*woods*/location_mentioned*, he thinks in that time he will gain his health. As I think it is not prudent for me to keep *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*alone in this new *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, I intend to have me a room put up joining *person_mentioned*Capt. Austin*/person_mentioned*s, he has always been to me a *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*and*person_mentioned* his wife a sister*/person_mentioned*. We have lived together so long that I cannot think of leaving them untill you move to *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*. I then will devide my time. This *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*is improving very fast, there is 8 or 10 rich *person_mentioned*gentlemen */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Tennessee */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Alabama */location_mentioned*come here to purchase *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*and will bring their *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1830">spring */date_mentioned*and I sincerely hope that land will then take a rise and pay *person_mentioned*Brother Stephen*/person_mentioned* for all his trouble, My *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned* my constant prayer will be for you to move to this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and cheer up *person_mentioned*Stephen*/person_mentioned*. I am my-self well enough but if you was here to tease and plague him, we could make him throw off that gloomy melancholy look and once more show a smiling countenance.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Little Stephen*/person_mentioned* has been very sick with a singular breaking out. I at first thought it was the hives. he is now getting much better and thank you very much for his cap and beeds. he could walk a few steps before he was taken sick. He is now beginning to talk, he sends his love to all his little *person_mentioned*cousins*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mr. John Austin*/person_mentioned* joins me in love to you.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Eliza W. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mrs. Emily M. Perry*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
